mapper.insert: insert into member (memberId, memberPw, memberNm, memberNicknm, memberStCd, memberFlCd, memberEmail,memberBirth, memberGen, memberMile, memberTel, memberPhoneVld, managerCnfmYn, memberLikeFld, memberProfileNm,memberProfilePath,insDt, udtDt) values(#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{memberNm},#{memberNicknm},#{memberStCd},#{memberFlCd}, #{memberEmail},#{memberBirth},#{memberGen},#{memberMile},#{memberTel},#{memberPhoneVld}, #{managerCnfmYn},#{memberLikeFld},#{memberProfileNm},#{memberProfilePath},sysdate,sysdate)
